item.title: About
item.description: Photo: Me looking cool as a child. Jeg heter Sigurd og jeg er en AI utvikler og student. Foreløpig bor jeg i Sydney, Australia hvor jeg studerer master i kunstig intelligens på University of Technology Sydney (UTS). Did you know UTS has been named the third best university in the world for artificial intelligence? Source: US News Education I grew up 78° north in Longyearbyen, Svalbard, a Norwegian archipelago close to the north pole where my father worked as a coal miner.
